title: Library Usage
description:
The Integrated Library System (ILS) is composed of bibliographic records including inventoried items, and patron records including circulation data. 
The data is used in the daily operation of the library, including circulation, online public catalog, cataloging, acquisitions, collection development, processing, and serials control.
This dataset represents the usage of inventoried items by active patrons. Per the California State Library definition, San Francisco Public Library defines active patrons as a) patrons with unexpired library cards and b) patrons who had circulation activity within the last three years.

columns.name: Patron Type Definition
columns.description: Patron Type determines a patronâ€™s borrowing limits

columns.name: Total Checkouts
columns.description: Number of items the patron borrowed since they registered for a library card

columns.name: Total Renewals
columns.description: Number of renewals the patron had on their borrowed items since they registered for a library card

columns.name: Home Library Definition
columns.description: The preferred location for patron usage of library services such as pickup for holds

columns.name: Circulation Active Month
columns.description: The last date (month) when a patron checks out or checks in physical items, places a hold, log in to their online account, or logs in to emagazines, enews, ebooks, eaudio, evideo, databases or Discover & Go

columns.name: Circulation Active Year
columns.description: The last date (year) when a patron checks out or checks in physical items, places a hold, log in to their online account, or logs in to emagazines, enews, ebooks, eaudio, evideo, databases or Discover & Go

columns.name: Notice Preference Definition
columns.description: Options for delivery method of the following notices: hold pickup, hold cancel, auto renew/courtesy (email notice only), 3 days overdue, 10 days overdue, 21 days overdue, 30 days overdue/bill.  If NONE is selected, the system attempts to send notices to patrons in the following order: email, phone, postal mail

columns.name: Year Patron Registered
columns.description: Date when a patron registers for a library card

columns.name: Within San Francisco County
columns.description: Whether a patron's provided physical address is within San Francisco City and County
